item.tcc.heavy_caliber_tag.desc: Heavy caliber is a curio that increases the base damage of rifle-type weapons, but also reduces its accuracy.
item.tcc.heavy_caliber_tag.effect: Increase %1$s%% rifle, sniper rifle, SMG, LMG, and launcher damage, reduce %2$s%% accuracy
item.tcc.red_movement_tag.desc: Fast movement and precise shooting perfectly combined
item.tcc.ural_wolf_tag.desc: Accurate and deadly strike, show the instinct of a hunter
item.tcc.heaven_fire_judgment.desc: I will launch an awesome attack
item.tcc.heaven_fire_judgment.effect: Increase %1$s%% universal firearm damage Subtract %2$s%% current health Consume %3$s%% maximum health per second for %4$s seconds Disable when health is below 40%%
item.tcc.heaven_fire_apocalypse.effect: At 100%% health Increase %1$s%% universal firearm damage +%2$s explosion range Increase %3$s%% explosion damage Subtract %4$s%% current health Provide %5$s%% universal firearm damage bonus to players within %6$s blocks for %7$s seconds
item.tcc.burst_reload.desc: Burst reload is a curio that can improve the reload speed of rifle-type weapons
item.tcc.burst_reload.effect: Increase %1$s%% rifle, sniper rifle, SMG, LMG, and launcher reload speed
item.tcc.corrupt_magazine.desc: Corrupt magazine is a fallen curio for assault rifles that sacrifices reload speed to increase magazine capacity
item.tcc.corrupt_magazine.effect: Increase %1$s%% rifle, sniper rifle, SMG, LMG, and launcher magazine capacity, reduce %2$s%% reload speed
item.tcc.split_chamber.desc: Split chamber is a curio that can increase the multiple shots of rifle-type weapons
item.tcc.split_chamber.effect: Increase %1$s%% rifle, sniper rifle, SMG, LMG, and launcher bullet count
item.tcc.despicable_acceleration.desc: Despicable acceleration is a fallen curio that sacrifices damage to increase the fire rate of rifle-type weapons
item.tcc.despicable_acceleration.effect: Increase %1$s%% shooting speed, reduce %2$s%% universal damage and all rifle, sniper rifle, SMG, LMG, launcher, pistol, and shotgun damage
item.tcc.merged_rifling.desc: Merged rifling is the merged version of rifling, sacrificing some damage but additionally increasing sprint speed
item.tcc.merged_rifling.effect: Increase %1$s%% rifle, sniper rifle, SMG, LMG, and launcher damage and %2$s%% gun movement speed, cannot be equipped with rifling at the same time
item.tcc.alloy_drill.desc: Alloy drill is a curio that can increase the penetration of rifle-type weapons
item.tcc.careful_heart.desc: I'm careful heart, definitely not an eel. Triple reinforcement of launcher damage
item.tcc.careful_heart.effect: Increase %1$s%% launcher damage bonus, %2$s%% explosion damage bonus, %3$s%% explosion range bonus
item.tcc.blaze_storm.desc: Blaze storm is a curio suitable for specific rifle-type weapons that can increase the range of weapon AoE damage.
item.tcc.blaze_storm.effect: Increase %1$s%% explosion range, increase %2$s%% explosion damage, cannot be equipped with Blaze Storm Prime at the same time
item.tcc.blaze_storm_prime.desc: Blaze storm prime is the prime version of blaze storm that can increase the range of weapon AoE damage.
item.tcc.blaze_storm_prime.effect: Increase %1$s%% explosion range, increase %2$s%% explosion damage, cannot be equipped with Blaze Storm at the same time
item.tcc.ripping_prime.desc: Ripping prime is the prime version of ripping that can increase 55% fire rate and 2.2 entity penetration
item.tcc.close_combat_prime.desc: Close combat prime is the prime version of close combat
item.tcc.evil_accuracy.desc: Evil accuracy is a special function curio that can reduce 90% recoil and 36% fire rate.
item.tcc.limit_speed.desc: Limit speed is a curio that can improve the projectile speed of rifle-type weapons
item.tcc.ferocious_extension.desc: Ferocious extension is a curio that can increase weapon range
item.tcc.rifling.desc: Rifling is a curio that can increase the base damage of rifle-type weapons
item.tcc.rifling.effect: Increase %1$s%% rifle, sniper rifle, SMG, LMG, and launcher damage, cannot be equipped with merged rifling at the same time
item.tcc.close_range_shot.desc: Close range shot is a curio that can increase the base damage of shotguns
item.tcc.heavy_firepower.desc: Heavy firepower is a fallen curio that can increase pistol damage but reduce accuracy
item.tcc.wasp_stinger.desc: Wasp stinger is a curio that can increase the base damage of pistols
item.tcc.prophecy_pact.desc: Prophecy pact is a curio that can improve the base damage of secondary pistols
item.tcc.malignant_spread.desc: Malignant spread is a shotgun fallen curio that sacrifices accuracy to increase base damage
item.tcc.chamber.desc: Chamber is a sniper rifle curio that can increase the damage of the first bullet in the magazine
item.tcc.chamber.effect: Increase %1$s%% damage when magazine is full for sniper rifles, cannot be equipped with chamber prime at the same time
item.tcc.chamber_prime.desc: Chamber prime is a sniper rifle curio that can increase the damage of the first bullet in the magazine
item.tcc.chamber_prime.effect: Increase %1$s%% damage when magazine is full for sniper rifles, cannot be equipped with chamber at the same time
item.tcc.core_fusion.desc: Core material obtained by burning curios in a furnace
item.tcc.rift_silver.effect: Right-click to randomly obtain a curio
item.tcc.tactical_reload.desc: Tactical reload is a curio that can improve the reload speed of shotguns
item.tcc.overloaded_magazine.desc: Overloaded magazine is a shotgun fallen curio that can increase magazine capacity but reduce reload speed
item.tcc.overloaded_magazine.effect: Increase %1$s%% shotgun magazine capacity, reduce %2$s%% reload speed
item.tcc.infernal_chamber.desc: Infernal chamber is a curio that increases multiple shots of shotguns
item.tcc.sustained_fire.desc: Sustained fire is a curio that can increase the reload speed of secondary weapons
item.tcc.infected_magazine.desc: Infected magazine is a fallen curio that sacrifices reload speed to increase magazine capacity
item.tcc.infected_magazine.effect: Increase %1$s%% pistol magazine capacity, reduce %2$s%% reload speed
item.tcc.deadly_surge.desc: Deadly surge is a nightmare curio that can increase pistol fire rate and multiple shots
item.tcc.deadly_surge.effect: Increase %1$s%% pistol fire rate, increase %2$s%% bullet count
item.tcc.bullet_spread.desc: Bullet spread is a curio that can increase multiple shots of pistols
item.tcc.oppression_point.desc: Oppression point is a curio that can increase the base damage of melee weapons
item.tcc.oppression_point_prime.desc: Oppression point prime is the prime version of oppression point
item.tcc.sword_wind.desc: Sword wind is a curio that can increase the attack range of melee weapons
item.tcc.sword_wind_prime.desc: Sword wind prime is the prime version of sword wind
item.tcc.depleted_reload.desc: Depleted reload is a fallen curio for sniper rifles that sacrifices magazine capacity to increase reload speed
item.tcc.depleted_reload.effect: Reduce %1$s%% magazine capacity, increase %2$s%% reload speed
item.tcc.burst_reload_prime.desc: Burst reload prime is the prime version of burst reload that can improve the reload speed of rifle-type weapons
item.tcc.burst_reload_prime.effect: Increase %1$s%% rifle, sniper rifle, SMG, LMG, and launcher reload speed
item.tcc.tactical_reload_prime.desc: Tactical reload prime is the prime version of tactical reload
item.tcc.shotgun_expansion_prime.desc: Shotgun expansion prime is the prime version of shotgun expansion
item.tcc.magazine_boost_prime.desc: Magazine boost prime is the prime version of magazine boost
item.tcc.magazine_boost_prime.effect: Increase %1$s%% rifle, sniper rifle, SMG, LMG, and launcher magazine capacity
item.tcc.tandem_magazine_prime.desc: Tandem magazine is a curio that can improve the magazine capacity of pistols
item.tcc.shotgun_expansion.desc: Shotgun expansion is a curio that can increase the magazine capacity of shotguns
item.tcc.magazine_boost.desc: Magazine boost is a curio that can improve the magazine capacity of rifle-type weapons
item.tcc.magazine_boost.effect: Increase %1$s%% rifle, sniper rifle, SMG, LMG, and launcher magazine capacity
item.tcc.tandem_magazine.desc: Tandem magazine is a curio that can improve the magazine capacity of secondary weapons
